testcase.classname: This feature file contains scenarios for Call in Free CRM
testcase.name: This scenario is to create call in CRM Application
This scenario is to create a contact in FreeCRM Application
testcase.system-out: Given User is on CRMHomePage................................................passed When User Navigates to New Contacts Page....................................passed Then User enters FirstName and LastName and Position details................passed Then User clicks on Save button.............................................passed Then Contact Created........................................................passed

testcase.name: Create a new deal data creation
testcase.system-out: Given User is on CRMHomePage................................................passed Then User move to New Deal Page.............................................passed Then User enters deals details..............................................passed

testcase.name: Creating a New Product using Deals
testcase.system-out: Given User is on CRMHomePage................................................passed When User moves to New Product Page.........................................passed And User enters Product details.............................................passed Then Clicked on Save button.................................................passed Then Product created Succesfully............................................passed
